citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:45 PM on
12/18/25.
The inspector arrived at 12:45 PM on 12/18/25 to conduct an inspection. The Licensee was on-site but was ill and unable
to accompany the inspector. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other
authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process at 12:45 PM on 
12/18/25.  
 
The inspector arrived at 12:45 PM on 12/18/25 to conduct an inspection. The Licensee was on-site but was ill and unable 
to accompany the inspector. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other 
authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.  
 
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
